phrases.phrase: Options for the Infusionsoft API by ThemeHouse add-on.
Your app name is the first part of your Infusionsoft URL. For example, if your URL is http://az123.infusionsoft.com/, then your app name is az123.

If enabled, whenever a user that is linked with an Infusionsoft contact is deleted, the associated contact will also be deleted. Note that with this option disabled, a user will be automatically re-pulled from Infusionsoft if the contact has any of the above selected tags.

Enabling this option will show an 'Opt In to Marketing' option on registration and on the contact details page. If selected by a user, they will be opted in to email marketing on Infusionsoft. Note that if a user opts out after they have opted in, they will be unable to opt in again through this site.
If marketing opt in is disabled or a user does not check the box to opt in on registration, they will not be exported to Infusionsoft until they have opted in.
Only users in the above user groups will be imported from Infusionsoft. Note that this doesn't cause any previously exported users or users with this user group removed to be deleted.

Find out how to create custom fields here:
http://ug.infusionsoft.com/article/AA-00224
Only users with the above tags will be imported from Infusionsoft. Note that this doesn't cause any previously imported users or users with this tag removed to be delete.
Invoices pulled from Infusionsoft will be marked as from this name. Leave this blank to use the username entered above.
Invoices pulled from Infusionsoft will be marked as from this user.

Find out how to get an Infusionsoft API key here:
http://ug.infusionsoft.com/article/AA-00442

To find your merchant account ID, go to:
InfusionSoft Control Panel -> E-Commerce -> Settings -> Merchant Accounts
and click on [Edit] next to the merchant account you would like to use. In your browser address bar, you will see a URL like https://az123.infusionsoft.com/MerchantAccount/manageMerchantAccount.jsp?view=edit&ID=XXXXX, where XXXXX is your merchant account ID.
When a user is added to/removed from one of the above user groups (including on registration) they will have the selected tag added to/removed from their Infusionsoft profile.
